articles.description: Hatate has come in for criticism for his foul on Kieran Freeman that resulted in only a booking from John Beaton.
articles.content:
Former top refs Steve Conroy and Des Roache reckon Reo Hatate should have been sent off for his foul on Kieran Freeman. 
 The Celtic midfielder has come under fire for his studs-up challenge on the … [+1286 chars]

articles.author: Sky
articles.title: Kurt Zouma: West Ham player to be prosecuted for kicking his cat, Sky News understands - Sky News
articles.content:
West Ham footballer Kurt Zouma will be prosecuted under the Animal Welfare Act after being filmed kicking his cat, Sky News understands.
The RSPCA has begun the prosecution process against Zouma and… [+2312 chars]
